metaface.server
Class MetaFaceDynamicService

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      metaface.server.MetaFaceService
          metaface.server.MetaFaceDynamicService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class MetaFaceDynamicService
extends MetaFaceService

This class provides a dynamic client service based on rendering of VHML files as they are needed for a response to a client's stimulus.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard
See Also:
HTTPClient, MetaFaceHTTPClient, MetaFaceHTTPServer
